mapper.select: SELECT stuno, name, substr(id, 1, length(id) -3) || '***' as id, grade, substr (jumin,1,6) || '-' || substr (jumin,7,1) || '*****' as jumin FROM stu

select s.stuno as stuNo, s.name as name, d1.dname as dpart, d.dname as dname, p.name as profname from stu s inner join department d on s.deptno1=d.deptno inner join department d1 on d1.deptno=d.part left join professor p on s.profno=p.profno where s.stuno= #{stuNo}
